scripts.test: rm -rf allure-results; jest --colors; allure generate; node src/bin/notify.mjs
scripts.policy-report: node src/report/policy.mjs; allure generate; node src/bin/notify.mjs
scripts.vulnerability-report: node src/report/vulnerability.mjs; allure generate; node src/bin/notify.mjs
scripts.kubescape-report: kubescape scan --format json --output kubescape.json; node src/report/kubescape.mjs; allure generate; node src/bin/notify.mjs
scripts.release-cd: if [ $NODE_WATCH_INSPECT ] ; then node --watch --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 src/index.mjs ; else node src/index.mjs ; fi
